issue.title: [CF 1402] Hide icons on bars
issue.body:
Is there a way to icon the icons on bar groups? If not please could you add the option?

For example, on a survival hunter, I have an icon showing when I have enough energy to use Raptor strike and I have a bar above it to show me the buff duration of the talent Way of the Mok'Nathal.

There is a temporary work around that I found which is to change the frame strata to low.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cyph1n | Imported from CurseForge issue #1402 | Raw

comments.body:
Go to the group settings page and under the bar texture there should be an option ticked to show icons. Just untick that and it will hide all icons in the bar group

Edited Apr 26, 2017

> Posted by CurseForge user Qustav_R

Ah thanks. I obviously didn't look very well XD

Edited Apr 29, 2017

> Posted by CurseForge user Cyph1n
